newsitem.title: USA: Ocean Financial sets initial cash dividend.
newsitem.headline: Ocean Financial sets initial cash dividend.

text.p: Ocean Financial Corp on Thursday announced a cash dividend of $0.20 a share, covering the three months ended March 31, 1997, to be paid May 12 to shareholders of record on May 5.
The company had previously announced plans to repurchase up to five percent of its outstanding common stock.
"The dividend payment is further evidence of our desire and commitment to aggressively manage our excess capital position," a company statement said.
Ocean Financial is the holding company for Ocean Federal Savings Bank.
